name: Batman the rooftop caper
summary: This time, Batman is in for an interesting and dangerous adventure. While he was busy with important things, enemies managed to attack Gotham City, and now Batman must quickly eliminate them. Night does not last long, but during this time he has to manage to kill all the aliens. So Batman will be jumping on the rooftops, climbing to the top floors and kill the enemies. During the game, he will be given hints by the Blue Beetle - his loyal friend. Play Batman and help him overcome all obstacles. Collect boomerangs, because it is the main weapon used by our hero. Also collect badges to earn big points in the game. Kill the enemies as fast as possible and try to save your own life. Good luck!
